sentences.sContent: Are we doing enough to protect the environment?
sentences.sCn: 我们在保护环境方面做得够吗？

sentences.sContent: ...The chief duty of every government is to protect persons and property...
...Grand to discuss ways in which we could help TGC protect itself from such problems and save money at the same time...
...Authors of the time could not protect their works...
...writers have copyrights that protect their work...
...except for those specifically needed to protect public safety...
...Tears protect the eye by keeping it moist...
...Citizens with much to protect get greater benefit from police than those with less to protect...
...The danger is that although some rules need to be updated to protect consumers from harm...
...Suffering in silence Despite a law designed to protect them...
...Only when it's gone do you wish you'd done more to protect it...

words.tran: 防护的；关切保护的；保护贸易的
贸易保护主义的；保护贸易论的
保护器；保护者；保护装置；防御者
保护主义，贸易保护主义
保护国；摄政政体；摄政职位；摄政任期

trans.tranOther: to keep someone or something safe from harm, damage, or illness
